languages.text: "Мои собратья стали военными советниками мон-кай, поднятых против владычицы мира. Мне выпала иная участь: стать наставницей Вистенцы, дабы повстанцы не смогли добраться до нее раньше момента, когда обе стороны ослабнут в достаточной мере. Правительница людей никогда не лицезрела Детей Азуриана — и потому приняла ложь о вырожденной ветви мон-кай, живущей вдали от прочих своих собратьев".

traits.locale_text: "Мои собратья стали военными советниками мон-кай, поднятых против владычицы мира. Мне выпала иная участь: стать наставницей Вистенцы, дабы повстанцы не смогли добраться до нее раньше момента, когда обе стороны ослабнут в достаточной мере. Правительница людей никогда не лицезрела детей Асурьян — и потому приняла ложь о вырожденной ветви мон-кай, живущей вдали от прочих своих собратьев".

languages.text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."
languages.original_text: "Мои собратья стали военными советниками мон-кай, поднятых против владычицы мира. Мне выпала иная участь: стать наставницей Вистенцы, дабы повстанцы не смогли добраться до нее раньше момента, когда обе стороны ослабнут в достаточной мере. Правительница людей никогда не лицезрела Детей Азуриана — и потому приняла ложь о вырожденной ветви мон-кай, живущей вдали от прочих своих собратьев".

I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to here until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

languages.text: 「同胞はこの星の支配者に反旗を翻したモン＝ケイらの軍事顧問になった。我には別の任務があった。ヴィステンツァの側近となること。反乱軍とヴィステンツァ双方が十分に疲弊するまで、両者が接触しないようにする役目だった。人間の支配者はそれまでにアシュリアンの御子らを見たことはなかったので、遠い星に住んでいたモン＝ケイの分派だという嘘を彼女は信じた」
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞はこの星の支配者に反旗を翻したモン＝ケイらの軍事顧問になった。我には別の任務があった。ヴィステンツァの側近となること。反乱軍とヴィステンツァ双方が十分に疲弊するまで、両者が接触しないようにする役目だった。人間の支配者はそれまでにアシュリアンの御子らを見たことはなかったので、遠い星に住んでいたモン＝ケイの分派だという嘘を彼女は信じた」

languages.text: “我的族人成为了反抗军的军事顾问，而我的任务与他们不同。我要成为维丝坦萨的守护者，确定反抗军不会过早地将她推下台，确保双方的力量都被充分地削弱。人类的统治者从未见过阿苏焉的子嗣，于是他相信了我的谎言，以为我不过是猴子之中的一员，过着离群索居的日子。”
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

traits.locale_text: “我的族人成为了反抗军的军事顾问，而我的任务与他们不同。我要成为维丝坦萨的守护者，确定反抗军不会过早地将她推下台，确保双方的力量都被充分地削弱。人类的统治者从未见过阿苏焉的子嗣，于是他相信了我的谎言，以为我不过是猴子之中的一员，过着离群索居的日子。”

languages.text: «Mis congéneres se convirtieron en asesores militares de los mon-keigh que se habían alzado contra la soberana de este mundo. Mi misión era distinta: yo debía controlar a Vistenza, ya que los rebeldes serían incapaces de llegar a ella hasta que ambos bandos se hubiesen debilitado. La gobernadora de los humanos no había visto nunca a un hijo de Asuryan, así que creyó la falsa historia sobre una comunidad de mon-keigh degenerados que vivían apartados de su propia especie».
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

traits.locale_text: «Mis congéneres se convirtieron en asesores militares de los mon-keigh que se habían alzado contra la soberana de este mundo. Mi misión era distinta: yo debía controlar a Vistenza, ya que los rebeldes serían incapaces de llegar a ella hasta que ambos bandos se hubiesen debilitado. La gobernadora de los humanos no había visto nunca a un hijo de Asuryan, así que creyó la falsa historia sobre una comunidad de mon-keigh degenerados que vivían apartados de su propia especie».

languages.text: "Die Meinen wurden zu militärischen Beratern der Chem-Pan-Sey, die sich gegen die Herrscherin dieser Welt erhoben. Meine Mission war eine andere: Ich sollte mich um Vistenza kümmern, weil die Rebellen erst zu ihr gelangen konnten, wenn beide Seiten ausreichend geschwächt waren. Die Herrscherin der Menschen hatte noch nie ein Kind von Asuryan gesehen und glaubte daher die Lüge von einer degenerierten Linie der Chem-Pan-Sey, die weitab ihrer eigenen Art hauste."
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

traits.locale_text: "Die Meinen wurden zu militärischen Beratern der Chem-Pan-Sey, die sich gegen die Herrscherin dieser Welt erhoben. Meine Mission war eine andere: Ich sollte mich um Vistenza kümmern, weil die Rebellen erst zu ihr gelangen konnten, wenn beide Seiten ausreichend geschwächt waren. Die Herrscherin der Menschen hatte noch nie ein Kind von Asuryan gesehen und glaubte daher die Lüge von einer degenerierten Linie der Chem-Pan-Sey, die weitab ihrer eigenen Art hauste."

languages.text: « Mes semblables sont devenus les conseillers militaires des mon-keigh qui se sont dressés contre la dirigeante de ce monde. Quant à moi, j'avais une mission différente : entrer au service de Vistenza en tant qu'aide, puisque les rebelles ne pourraient jamais l'atteindre tant que les deux camps ne seraient pas suffisamment affaiblis. Comme elle n'avait encore jamais croisé d'enfant d'Asuryan, elle n'a rien trouvé à redire lorsque je lui ai expliqué appartenir à une lointaine branche dégénérée des mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."

traits.locale_text: « Mes semblables sont devenus les conseillers militaires des mon-keigh qui se sont dressés contre la dirigeante de ce monde. Quant à moi, j'avais une mission était différente : entrer au service de Vistenza en tant qu'aide, puisque les rebelles ne pourraient jamais l'atteindre tant que les deux camps ne seraient pas suffisamment affaiblis. Comme elle n'avait encore jamais croisé d'enfant d'Asuryan, elle n'a rien trouvé à redire lorsque je lui ai expliqué appartenir à une lointaine branche dégénérée des mon-keigh. »

languages.text: "Hısımlarım bu dünyanın hükümdarına karşı ayaklanan mon-keighlere askerî danışmanlık yapıyordu. Benimse farklı bir görevim vardı: Vistenza'nın adamı olmak. Zira isyancılar, her iki taraf da yeterince zayıflayana dek kendisine el süremeyecekti. İnsan hükümdarı, daha önce hiç Asuryan'ın Çocuğu görmemişti. Bu yüzden türünden uzakta yaşayan, yozlaşmış bir mon-keigh kolundan geldiğim yalanını yuttu."
languages.original_text: "My kin became military advisors to the mon-keigh who rose up against the ruler of this world. I had a different mission: to become Vistenza's handler, since the rebels would be unable to get to her until both sides were sufficiently weakened. The ruler of the humans had never seen a Child of Asuryan before, and so she accepted the lie about a degenerate branch of mon-keigh dwelling far from their own kind."
